item.title: Gadgets Weekly: Vivo Y29 5G and more - Deccan Herald
item.description:
Tech Weekly: New Launches and Initiatives

Date & Source: Published on 30 December 2024, 10:45 IST, Deccan Herald

Introduction: This week (December 16-22, 2024) saw several new product launches in the tech industry, including phones, accessories, and more.

  1. Vivo Y29 5G: A budget-friendly 5G smartphone with impressive features like a 6.68-inch HD+ display, MediaTek Dimensity 6300 processor, and a 5,500mAh battery with 44W charging speed.
  2. Lava Yuva 2 5G: An affordable 5G smartphone with a 6.67-inch HD+ display, Unisoc T760 processor, and a 5,000mAh battery.
  3. Zeb-Axon 200 Bluetooth speaker: A rugged, portable speaker with 180W RMS output, RGB lights, and an IPX6 rating.
  4. Goldmedal Electricals steam and dry iron series: New irons with triple-coated and Weilburger non-stick soleplates, convenient controls, and a 360-degree swivel cord.
  5. Xiaomi Xplorers Programme: Xiaomi's initiative to reward and recognize innovative tech projects in India.
  6. Whirlpool and PG Electroplas to bring co-branded washing machines: Whirlpool and PG Electroplas partner to manufacture select models of Whirlpool-branded semi-automatic washing machines.
  7. Vivo Ignite: Technology and Innovation Initiative: Vivo's competition to encourage and reward innovative tech solutions aligned with the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs).
  8. Samsung to launch new line of ACs in 2025 in India: Samsung plans to introduce over a dozen inverter Air Conditioners with proprietary Bespoke Artificial Intelligence features.

“The T&I Initiative is more than just a competition – it’s a commitment to building a future where innovation and sustainability go hand-in-hand.” - Geetaj Channana, Head of Corporate Strategy, Vivo India

Conclusion: This week's tech launches and initiatives offer a mix of affordable devices, innovative solutions, and partnerships, catering to various consumer needs and interests.

item.title: Telangana CM, IT Minister meet Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella in Hyderabad - The Hindu
item.description:
Telangana Leaders Meet with Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella in Hyderabad

Date & Source: December 30, 2024, The Hindu

Telangana Chief Minister A. Revanth Reddy, IT and Industries Minister D. Sridhar Babu, and other officials met with Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella in Hyderabad on Monday (December 30, 2024). The meeting discussed the expansion of Microsoft's data centers in the city and Nadella's recent visit to his alma mater.

  1. The IT Minister had previously requested Microsoft representatives to complete the expansion of their data centers by the end of 2025.
  2. Hyderabad-born Satya Nadella recently participated in the centenary celebrations at his alma mater, Hyderabad Public School.
"In a meeting with representatives of the global giant a few months ago, the IT Minister requested them to complete expansion of their data centres near the city by the end of 2025."

Published - December 30, 2024 04:09 pm IST

item.title: 5 Apple Intelligence features to arrive in 2025 - India Today
item.description:
5 Apple Intelligence Features Set to Launch in 2025

Publication Date: Not specified Source: India Today

Apple is preparing to enhance its Apple Intelligence capabilities with several new features that will be rolled out in 2025, following the iOS 18.2 update.

  • Priority Notifications: A new feature that allows users to see important notifications first.
  • New Siri Capabilities: Siri will gain support for personal context and deeper app integration.
  • GenMoji: This feature, previously exclusive to iPhones and iPads, will be introduced to macOS in early 2025.
  • Memory Movies: Apple plans to bring the memory movies feature to Macs, currently available only on iOS devices.
  • Multi-lingual Support: New support for various languages will be added, enhancing user accessibility worldwide.
“Apple Intelligence will have Priority Notifications so you can see what's important first.”

These improvements are expected to significantly enhance user experience, making Apple devices even more intuitive and responsive to user needs.

item.title: WhatsApp to stop working on these Android phones from January 1: Check the full list - India Today
item.description:
WhatsApp to Stop Working on Over 20 Older Android Phones from January 1, 2025

Published On: Dec 30, 2024 by Aman Rashid

Starting January 1, 2025, WhatsApp will cease to function on over 20 outdated Android smartphones, including models from Samsung, Motorola, HTC, LG, and Sony that run on Android KitKat or earlier.

  • WhatsApp is phasing out support for devices operating on Android 4.4 (KitKat) or earlier to ensure better security and functionality.
  • Affected devices include older models, many of which are nearly a decade old or more.
  • Brands like HTC and LG, which have stopped smartphone production, are among those impacted.
  • Users are advised to back up their chats to transition smoothly to newer phones.
“If you’re still using one of these phones, now might be the time to consider upgrading.”

item.title: Will GTA 6 Be Delayed? Here's How Rockstar-Owner Take Two Still Offers Hope For 2025 Release - ABP Live
item.description:
GTA 6 Release Timeline: Take-Two Confirms 2025 Launch, Hypes Upcoming Titles

Publication Date: Article Publish Date, Source: Abplive

GTA fans worldwide awaited the GTA 6 trailer on December 27, but it didn't materialize. However, Take-Two Interactive, Rockstar Games' parent company, has reassured fans that GTA 6 will indeed release in the fall of 2025.

Key Points

  • GTA 6 is confirmed to release in Q3/Q4 2025
  • Take-Two expects GTA 6 to set new industry benchmarks, following the success of GTA V (205 million copies) and Red Dead Redemption 2 (62 million copies)
  • Upcoming Take-Two titles include Civilization 7, WWE 2K25, Borderlands 4, and Mafia: The Old Country

Notable Quote

Strauss Zelnick, CEO of Take-Two Interactive: "With many exciting new titles coming in Fiscal 2026 – including Grand Theft Auto VI, Borderlands 4, and Mafia: The Old Country – we expect to create long-term value for our shareholders."

item.title: Soon, WhatsApp web will allow reverse image search through Google: Details - Business Standard
item.description:
WhatsApp Web to Introduce Reverse Image Search via Google

Date & Source: Dec 30 2024 | 3:00 PM IST, Business Standard

Meta is reportedly working with Google to tackle misinformation on WhatsApp. The reverse image search feature, first tested on Android, is now being explored for the WhatsApp web client. This feature will allow users to search an image on the web using Google, helping them gather more context and determine if the image has been manipulated. The feature is expected to be available soon on both WhatsApp Android app and WhatsApp Web.

  • The feature will allow users to upload a photo to Google to perform a reverse image search.
  • It is expected to be available on both WhatsApp Android app and WhatsApp Web in the coming weeks.
  • The feature is akin to Google's existing reverse image search but more convenient as it's integrated within WhatsApp.
While Meta has not officially confirmed the availability of the new reverse image search feature, it is expected to be available soon.

Source: Business Standard

item.title: Redmi Turbo 4 Launching on 2 January 2025: Expected Features and Expectations - The Quint
item.description:
Redmi Turbo 4 Launching on 2 January 2025: Expected Features and Expectations

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: The Quint

The Redmi Turbo 4 is set for launch in China on January 2, 2025, emphasizing its performance and gaming capabilities. The device will be available for reservations, with a global release expected as the POCO X7 Pro.

Key Points

  • Launch date confirmed for January 2, 2025, in China.
  • Design includes a dual rear camera setup and a vertical red line on the back.
  • Color options include off-white, black, and cyan.
  • Powered by the Dimensity 8400 Ultra processor, offering impressive performance scores.
  • Expected features include a 6.67-inch display, a dual rear camera of 50MP+8MP, and a 6,500mAh battery.
“Good-looking and good to play (able to fight)” - Gaming tagline from the launch poster featuring Fan Zhendong.

This launch signifies Xiaomi's continued focus on performance-oriented devices, catering to gaming enthusiasts.

item.title: LG UltraGear GX9 Series With 5K2K OLED Display Announced Ahead of CES 2025 - Gadgets 360
item.description:
LG Will Unveil Its 5K2K Resolution Bendable Gaming Monitor at CES 2025

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Gadgets 360

LG has announced a new lineup of gaming monitors set to be unveiled at CES 2025, featuring significant advancements including the flexible 5K2K OLED display.

  • The LG UltraGear GX9 series includes three models, with the 45GX990A being a key highlight.
  • The 45GX990A features a 45-inch bendable OLED screen that transitions from flat to a 900R curvature.
  • It boasts a resolution of 5,120 x 2,160 pixels and a 21:9 aspect ratio for immersive gaming.
  • Both the 45GX990A and 45GX950A models support NVIDIA G-SYNC and AMD FreeSync Premium Pro technology.
  • The 39GX90SA model runs on LG's webOS platform, enhancing its entertainment capabilities.
“It has already secured the ‘Best of Innovation' title at the CES 2025 Innovation Awards.”

In conclusion, LG's UltraGear GX9 series promises to redefine the gaming experience with its innovative technology and design, making it a must-see at CES 2025.

item.title: Olympic Esports, GTA-6, new consoles: 2025 gaming calender is HOT! - NewsBytes
item.description:
2025 Gaming Calendar: Olympic Esports, GTA-6, and New Consoles

Published on: March 2025 Source: NewsBytesApp

The gaming industry, after a tough year of layoffs and studio closures, is gearing up for a major transformation in 2025. The highly-anticipated release of Grand Theft Auto 6 (GTA 6), new hardware from Nintendo, and the first-ever Olympic Esports Games are set to spearhead this change.

Key Points

  • GTA 6: The trailer for GTA 6 has already garnered 90 million views, indicating massive anticipation. It will have dual protagonists and is expected to drive console sales. Industry analysts predict it could be the biggest game launch ever.
  • Nintendo's New Console: The console will be backward compatible with existing Switch games and is expected to be a more powerful version of the current Switch. An official announcement is expected by March 2025.
  • Indie Games: Despite challenges, indie games continue to showcase innovation. Notable releases for 2025 include Assassin's Creed Shadows, Ghost of Yotei, and Civilization VII.
  • Olympic Esports Games: The first-ever Olympic Esports Games will take place in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, in 2025, reflecting the rising popularity of esports among the younger demographic.
According to IOC estimates, over 500 million people are interested in esports, with the majority under the age of 34.

2025 promises to be an exciting year for gamers, with something for everyone across various gaming genres and platforms.

item.title: Huawei slashes high-end device prices on JD.com's Super Brand Day - Investing.com
item.description:
Huawei Reduces Prices for High-End Devices on JD.com's Super Brand Day

Date: Recent

Source: Investing.com

Over the weekend, Huawei announced significant price reductions on its high-end devices on JD.com, one of China's leading e-commerce platforms.

  • The price cuts reached up to 3,000 yuan (approximately $411).
  • This promotion was part of a "Super Brand Day" event that lasted from Saturday evening to midnight on Sunday.
  • Discounts were available on various products including smartphones, headphones, watches, and tablets.
  • Huawei is recognized as Apple's primary competitor in the Chinese smartphone market, along with Samsung Electronics.
The discounts were widely shared on Huawei's official Weibo account.

This move by Huawei aims to bolster its competitive stance against rivals in the high-end smartphone market.

item.title: WhatsApp Web to get reverse image search feature soon to help users identify fake photos - Moneycontrol
item.description:
WhatsApp Web to get reverse image search feature soon to help users identify fake photos

Date: December 30, 2024 / Source: Moneycontrol

WhatsApp is introducing a new reverse image search feature to tackle the spread of fake information. This will allow WhatsApp users to authenticate received images via Google and provide a more reliable way to judge the authenticity of shared images.

  • Meta plans to help users identify fake photos on WhatsApp using reverse image search.
  • Users can tap any image in a chat to initiate a reverse image search.
  • The 'Search on the web' option will be available in the three-dot menu for selected images.
  • This feature was previously spotted in the Android beta application.
  • Google's database will help verify the authenticity of shared images.
"The popular messaging platform WhatsApp has often been used for escalating various fake or misleading information across its millions of users."

This new feature aims to combat the spread of misinformation and help users verify the images they receive.

item.title: iPhone SE 4 price leak springs up a surprise, could come with five upgrades - 91mobiles
item.description:
iPhone SE 4 Price Leak Springs Up a Surprise, Could Come with Five Upgrades

Publication Date: Not specified Source: 91mobiles

The iPhone SE 4 is expected to launch in March 2024 with a global price of around $500, featuring several upgrades from its predecessor, including a new design, advanced camera capabilities, and an in-house 5G modem.

Key Points

  • The iPhone SE 4 is rumored to be priced at $500 or lower.
  • It may feature Apple's own 5G modem, which could decrease costs.
  • Significant upgrades include a 6.1-inch OLED display, USB-C port, improved cameras, and enhanced AI capabilities.
“Apple is expected to introduce the new 5G modem (codenamed Centauri) in the iPhone SE lineup.”

In conclusion, the upcoming iPhone SE 4 is set to deliver a competitive price and significant advancements, aligning with Apple's shift toward more affordable and innovative smartphones.

item.title: Xiaomi Pad 7 set to launch on January 10: Here’s everything we expect - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Xiaomi Pad 7 Set to Launch in India on January 10, 2025

Date: Dec 30, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Xiaomi has announced that the Xiaomi Pad 7 will launch in India on January 10, 2025, following its debut in China. The tablet will be available on Amazon, with some accessories expected to accompany the launch.

Key Points:

  • The tablet features an 11.2-inch LCD display with a 144Hz refresh rate.
  • It is powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3 processor.
  • The device supports HDR10 and Dolby Vision for enhanced display quality.
  • It includes a 13MP rear camera and an 8MP front camera.
  • Battery capacity is 8,850mAh with 45W fast charging support.
  • Pricing in India is yet to be announced, but is expected to be in the mid-range segment.

Notable Quotes or Statistics:

The Xiaomi Pad 7 was launched in China starting at CNY 1,999 (approximately Rs. 23,500).

Reports suggest that the Indian version may differ slightly in specifications.

Conclusion: The Xiaomi Pad 7 is set to bring competitive features to the mid-range tablet market in India, aimed at users looking for a combination of performance and affordability.

item.title: Owner Bought Maruti Invicto But Got Innova Hycross Instead - MotorOctane
item.description:
Owner Converts Maruti Invicto into Toyota Innova Hycross

Date: October 2023
Source: MotorOctane

The article details the story of a car owner who bought a Maruti Invicto but decided to modify it to resemble a Toyota Innova Hycross. This is notable due to the long waiting periods for the Innova Hycross and the popularity it enjoys.

  • Toyota Innova Hycross has a significant waiting period and is more expensive than Maruti Invicto.
  • The owner transformed the Invicto by modifying the exterior and interior to resemble the Innova Hycross.
  • Exterior modifications include a new grille, bumper, alloy wheels, and rear lights resembling those of the Innova Hycross.
  • Interior changes involved replacing the Suzuki logo with Toyota, adding new steering wheel features, and upgrading the audio system.
  • The transformation was revealed in a video by Indian AutoZone.
“The Indian Motor Vehicle Act states that any modification on the car outside the OEM factory premise is considered illegal.”

This transformation highlights the demand for the Innova Hycross and the lengths owners might go to acquire its aesthetic appeal.

item.title: Apple Days Sale at Vijay Sales: iPhones, MacBooks, iPads, and more at unbeatable prices - The Financial Express
item.description:
Apple Days Sale at Vijay Sales: iPhones, MacBooks, iPads, and more at unbeatable prices

Date: December 29th, 2024 - January 5th, 2025

Source: Financial Express

Vijay Sales has launched its “Apple Days Sale,” offering discounts up to Rs 10,000 on various Apple products.

  • The sale runs from December 29th, 2024, to January 5th, 2025.
  • Instant discounts available with bank cards and trade-in deals.
  • Highlights include iPhone 13 at Rs 42,900 and up to Rs 10,000 off on MacBooks.
  • Accessories like Apple Watches and AirPods also on sale with significant discounts.
“Grab an iPhone 13 for as low as Rs 42,900 after a Rs 1,000 instant discount...”

Don’t miss out on these limited-time offerings during the festival sale!

item.title: Ministry issues draft guidelines on establishing EV charging infrastructure under PM E-DRIVE - BusinessLine
item.description:
Ministry Issues Draft Guidelines for EV Charging Infrastructure

Date & Source: Updated - December 30, 2024 at 01:34 PM, The Hindu Business Line

Introduction: The Ministry of Heavy Industries (MHI) has issued draft guidelines for setting up electric vehicle (EV) charging infrastructure under the Prime Minister Electric Drive Revolution in Innovative Vehicle Enhancement (PM E-DRIVE) Scheme.

  1. The scheme aims to set up over 22,000 EV chargers for electric four wheelers and 1,800 chargers for e-buses.
  2. It also includes provisions for charging infrastructure for light EVs like electric two-wheelers and electric three-wheelers.
  3. The government aims to involve various stakeholders, including charge point operators, EV charger manufacturers, and other government bodies.
  4. The scheme offers an 80% subsidy on upstream infrastructure, with an outlay of ₹2,000 crore.

Notable Quote: According to the draft guidelines, central-level Ministries and State governments are encouraged to carry out feasibility studies to identify suitable locations for EV charging stations.

Conclusion: The draft guidelines for EV charging infrastructure aim to expand public charging facilities, involving various stakeholders and offering significant subsidies to promote EV adoption in India.

item.title: OnePlus Open 2 could launch in Q1 2025: Expected specs, new design, more - Business Standard
item.description:
OnePlus Open 2: Coming in Q1 2025 with Enhanced Design and Specs

Date & Source: January 12, 2024 - 9To5Google

OnePlus is gearing up to launch the successor to its first foldable smartphone, the OnePlus Open, in the first quarter of 2025. The OnePlus Open 2 is expected to bring improvements in design and performance, with a new Qualcomm Snapdragon eight Elite chip, increased storage, and a larger battery.

  • New design with rounded edges and a smaller camera module
  • 18-inch inner foldable display with a 6.4-inch cover screen
  • Triple 50MP rear camera setup
  • 16GB RAM and up to 1TB storage
  • 5900mAh battery with 80W wired and 50W wireless charging

Notable Quote: "The OnePlus Open 2 is expected to be slightly larger but thinner than its predecessor."

Sources expect the OnePlus Open 2 to launch in March 2025, bringing significant upgrades to OnePlus's foldable lineup.

item.title: OnePlus 13, Samsung Galaxy S25 And More: Big Phone Launches Coming In January 2025 - News18
item.description:
OnePlus 13, Samsung Galaxy S25 And More: Big Phone Launches Coming In January 2025

Date: December 30, 2024

Source: News18

The tech world is gearing up for a series of significant smartphone launches in January 2025, including offerings from OnePlus, Samsung, and Xiaomi.

Key Launches to Expect:

  • OnePlus 13: Launching on January 7, featuring an upgraded design and specifications including an X2 OLED display and Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
  • Xiaomi Pad 7 and Redmi 14C: Affordable 5G device expected to support dual-SIM networks and a 50MP camera.
  • Samsung Galaxy S25 Series: Set to introduce flagship models in the competitive premium market.

"The OnePlus 13 looks less-curvier thanks to the flat frame, providing a modern aesthetic along with upgraded features such as an IP69 rating for water resistance."

As the new year arrives, tech enthusiasts are anticipating these exciting advancements in smartphone technology.

item.title: Ahead of the OnePlus 13R launch, the OnePlus 12 gets as low as Rs 55,938 - The Indian Express
item.description:
Ahead of the OnePlus 13R launch, the OnePlus 12 gets as low as Rs 55,938

Publication Date: January 2024 Source: Indian Express

The OnePlus 12 is now available at an all-time low price of Rs 55,938 on Flipkart, just days before the OnePlus 13 series launch.

  • The price drop is nearly Rs 10,000 from its initial launch price.
  • Available discounts may further lower the price for users with select bank cards.
  • The OnePlus 12 features Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, 12 GB RAM, and 256 GB storage.
  • It boasts a 6.82-inch curved AMOLED screen with 2K resolution and 120Hz refresh rate.
  • The rear camera setup includes a 50 MP wide-angle, a 48 MP ultra-wide, and a 64 MP periscope lens.
  • It supports 100W fast charging and has a 5,400 mAh battery.
  • Potential buyers may consider waiting for the upcoming OnePlus 13R.
“Overall, for the asking price, the OnePlus 12 remains a compelling option for anyone seeking a high-end Android flagship smartphone for under Rs 60,000.”

With the OnePlus 13 series launch imminent, the price cut on the OnePlus 12 presents an attractive opportunity for buyers, though waiting for the new model may be wise.

item.title: Better Networking Hacks: Top Reasons It Is Vital For Career - Jagran Josh
item.description:
Better Networking Hacks: Top Reasons It Is Vital For Career

Date: 30, Dec 2024 Source: jagranjosh.com

Networking is essential for career growth, as it helps individuals reach their professional goals more swiftly. This article delves into tips for effective networking and its importance in career advancement.

  • Networking aids in career progression.
  • Strong industry connections lead to new opportunities and skill enhancement.
  • Engagement with professionals boosts experience and performance.
  • Networking introduces fresh ideas and diverse perspectives.

item.title: Apple discontinues iPhone 14, iPhone SE in EU as USB-C becomes mandatory - Business Standard
item.description:
Apple Discontinues iPhone 14 and iPhone SE in EU Due to USB-C Regulations

Date: Dec 30 2024 | Source: Business Standard

In response to new regulations mandating USB-C connectors, Apple has stopped selling iPhone 14 and iPhone SE models in the European Union, while these models remain available in other regions including India.

  • The EU required all electronic devices to adopt USB-C by December 28.
  • Apple's new iPhone 15 series uses USB-C, but earlier models with Lightning connectors are discontinued in the EU.
  • iPhones are still sold in markets outside the EU, like India.
Apple might phase out its Lightning connectors completely with future iPhone releases.

This shift indicates Apple's alignment with regulatory changes in the EU and could lead to broader market implications as the company transitions its product lines globally.

item.title: Youtube testing out a new feature ‘Play Something’ button for Android - The Hindu
item.description:
YouTube's New 'Play Something' Button for Android in Testing

Date & Source: December 30, 2024, The Hindu

YouTube is reportedly testing a new ‘Play Something’ button which will play a video picked by the platform for users. A new report by 9to5Google revealed that clicking a floating button starts a YouTube Shorts clip.

  • The button shows up just above the bottom bar of the app and when clicked on, picks a video to play.
  • The platform usually experiments with new updates on YouTube Shorts before releasing it widely for all types of regular content.
  • The button has been in testing for over a year and was initially considered as a separate banner.
  • YouTube has recently released several AI features, including auto dubbing and suggestions for subtitles and thumbnails, and added features to its Miniplayer.

item.title: YouTube is testing a ‘Play Something’ button for Android: Report - The Hindu
item.description:
YouTube is testing a ‘Play Something’ button for Android: Report

Date & Source: December 30, 2024 12:31 pm IST

YouTube is reportedly testing a new ‘Play Something’ button that plays a video selected by the platform for users. This button, when clicked, initiates a YouTube Shorts clip and appears just above the bottom bar of the app.

  • The button has been in testing for over a year and may extend beyond YouTube Shorts to regular content.
  • The recent design change aims to enhance accessibility for users.
  • Other advanced features, including AI dubbing and subtitle suggestions, have been introduced by the platform.
“The change to the design makes it more accessible.”

The ongoing testing of the button indicates YouTube's commitment to enhancing user experience through new features.

item.title: WhatsApp users ALERT! WhatsApp to stop working on these smartphones from...., check full list here - India.com
item.description:
WhatsApp to Stop Working on These Smartphones from January 1

Date & Source: December 28, 2024, India.com

WhatsApp Update: American instant messaging and voice-over-IP (VoIP) service WhatsApp is the most popular messaging platform in the world. The company is owned by the technology conglomerate Meta. WhatsApp allows users to send text and multimedia messages and share images, documents, user locations, and other content instantly. The app can be accessed on both smartphones and browsers. Users only need a cellular mobile telephone number to sign up for the app. In addition to individual users, several companies also utilize their services to communicate with employees in real time. WhatsApp’s voice and video calls have revolutionized communication, providing users with the best possible experience.

In a major announcement, WhatsApp has recently made a crucial announcement that directly impacts old smartphone users. The instant messaging app, will no longer be supported on smartphones running Android’s KitKat operating system (OS) or older versions. This major change is going to directly affect people using 9-10 years old phones.

Notably, iPhone users have a deadline of May 2025 to update their older devices.

What Steps Affected Users Can Take?

The affected users, with old phones, want to continue using WhatsApp and need to upgrade to the latest phones with newer operating systems.

Why WhatsApp is phasing out older phones

According to Meta, the decision is part of an effort to maintain security and functionality. With the advancement of the technology, older devices are not able to support new features or protect sensitive data effectively.

Without security patches these devices become prime target of hackers and fall prey to cybercrime. Hence, the company has decided to support those devices that can run up-to-date software.

WhatsApp To Stop Support On These Smartphones

  • Samsung Galaxy S3
  • Motorola Moto G (1st Gen)
  • HTC One X & HTC One X+
  • Sony Xperia Z
  • LG Optimus G
  • LG Nexus 4
  • Sony Xperia T, V, and SP

The Instant Messaging App Will Stop Its Services On Old Apple Devices As Well

Android users will be directly impacted by the immediate cutoff of support, while iPhone users have a bit more room to breathe with a deadline of May 5, 2025, to get their systems up-to-date. Post this date, iPhones operating on iOS 15.1 or earlier won’t be able to get support from WhatsApp. Meaning, those who use iPhone 5s, iPhone 6, and iPhone 6 Plus will be faced with a choice – either get a newer model or update their iOS to stay connected on WhatsApp.

item.title: Oppo Find N5 Key Features Leaked; Said to Get Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Oppo Find N5: Upcoming Foldable with Snapdragon 8 Elite and Impressive Cameras

Date & Source: December 26, 2024 - Gadgets 360

Oppo Find N5, the successor to the Oppo Find N3, is expected to launch in the first half of 2025. The upcoming foldable smartphone has been the subject of various leaks, revealing key features and specifications. The latest leak suggests the phone will be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, support up to 16GB of RAM and 1TB of storage, and sport a 5,700mAh battery with 80W wired and 50W wireless charging.

  1. The Oppo Find N5 is expected to have a 6.4-inch cover screen and an 8-inch 2K main display, both supporting a 120Hz refresh rate.
  2. The phone is tipped to feature a triple-camera setup at the rear, including a 50MP primary sensor, a 50MP ultra-wide angle lens, and a 50MP telephoto shooter.
  3. The internal front camera is expected to be placed on the top right side of the display.
  4. Previously, Oppo Find series Product Head Zhou Yibao teased the Oppo Find N5 moniker and hinted at AI features, improved network support, and an IPX8-rated build for splash resistance.
  5. An earlier leak claimed that the Oppo Find N5 will be launched in China before the Oppo Find X8 Ultra, which is expected after the Chinese New Year.
According to a Weibo post by tipster Panda Is Very Bald, the Oppo Find N5 is expected to be powered by a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.

The Oppo Find N5 is expected to be a significant addition to the foldable smartphone market, with its impressive specifications and features. The phone is anticipated to compete with other high-end foldable devices such as the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and the OnePlus Open 2.
